name: Murgee Auto Mouse Click Script
summary: An MAMC file is a mouse click script created by Murgee Auto Mouse Click. It contains directives used to execute a set of automated Windows actions, such as opening an application or performing mouse clicks. MAMC files can be opened and edited only in Murgee Auto Mouse Click.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: MAMC file open in Murgee Auto Mouse Click
images.alt: MAMC file open in Murgee Auto Mouse Click
